description: This file defines a Kotlin class 'TodoFragment' that manages a to-do list UI in an Android app. It includes setup for RecyclerView, handling user interactions for adding, editing, deleting, and filtering tasks, and interacts with a ViewModel for data operations.

classes.name: TaskAdapter
classes.description: A RecyclerView Adapter for displaying the list of tasks, with callback functions for toggling, deleting, and editing tasks.

classes.name: TaskViewHolder
classes.description: A RecyclerView ViewHolder that binds individual task data to UI elements and sets up interaction handlers.

methods.name: onViewCreated
methods.description: Initializes UI components, sets up RecyclerView and button click listeners, and launches coroutine to collect UI state updates.

methods.name: bind
methods.description: Binds a Task object to the RecyclerView item views, setting text, status, and interaction handlers.
